data.text: @VidiotsShow @MarkerRyan625 I’ve taken some pretty skeptical people into that movie who have come out converts. It’s so sweet and lovable.

@VidiotsShow @MarkerRyan625 I haven’t seen BFG either, and Crystal Skull should definitely be avoided. That said, after Bridge of Spies.......... 

...you should really watch The Terminal. You’ll probably be glad you did. https://t.co/DGXRC9sv7d
@VidiotsShow @claykeller It looks like it’s gonna be Empire and that’s great. Definitely my favorite “underviewed” Spielberg film

@VidiotsShow @MarkerRyan625 Really been meaning to re-watch Crystal Skull. My post-theater working hypothesis was: "If you swapped the release dates of Temple and Crystal, Temple would be the most hated of the franchise."
Want to test it out ten years later.
@filipefcoutinho @VidiotsShow Felipe, please. I beg of you...
@VidiotsShow @MarkerRyan625 I’d love nothing more than hearing a discussion about Crystal Skull!!
@VidiotsShow @claykeller I voted for Duel but it was supposed to be Empire of the Sun. Twitter won’t let me change my vote I have fat fingers
@claykeller @MarkerRyan625 @VidiotsShow Do 1941. You get a contact coke high just by watching it
@MarkerRyan625 @VidiotsShow The vote margins are much smaller than I was expecting...
@VidiotsShow @claykeller Cmon 1941!!! Im dying to hear Clay's reaction to this epic mess.
Don't even get us started on @claykeller, who has never seen THESE Spielberg flicks. Vote! What should we do on the show?
@MarkerRyan625 has never seen these Spielberg films (we know, we know). Which one should we do on the show?
